title: The World of three
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child development
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child psychology
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child development
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child psychology
description: Home can be big and bewildering and the people in it can seem larger than life in the eyes of a three-year old boy. In this film such a little boy is observed in his response to his home environment, and what it means to be on the receiving end of what is called "child training" is reflected.
